MACHETE.raw_line: This is the boss.Get dressed.We need to go. Now.My machete.Torrez?$70 a day for yardwork. Hundred for roofing. One-twenty-five for septic. Sewage.I cost the most, because I'm the best there is.Like the car.What are you looking for, Mr. Benz?That doesn't sound like your problem.What do you want me to do?Collateral.This is Cisco's floor. I'm on 11.Find Cisco.Another way out?Thanks.Did you open it?I don't know about that.Why are you helping me?You know me?The myth might be better.Bless me, Padre, for I have sinned. It's been a long fucking time since my last confession.Sorry, bro. I mean, Padre.Few weeks.Didn't need you before.I'm not sorry.They used me.They need to pay. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 46.Either. Both.Yes, bro. I mean, Padre.When I get the money, I'll give some to the church.A hundred-fifty thousand.Stop it.That one. He's the one who hired me. Benz.Where does he live?I'll leave some for you.My money.Or else.He called in sick.Or else this.Drive.You're a cop.How did you find me?Turn here.It was just a job.Michael Booth.Maybe. Turn here.Give me ten dollars.Ten bucks.Stop the car.Wait.For the tacos and coffee.Drive.No hospital.Onions.Onions!Come here.Yes.Do it.Luck.The guards told me that before they beat me.You came to arrest me?Out? RNewman / Endeavor Draft 68.The day's still young.Help me find Booth.Give it here.Si.You're borracha. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 70.Come on!Not long enough.Looking for someone?Follow him.I was born in the fire. It wasn't luck. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 83.What good is it...I'm still standing...Puta.What's the problem officer?Let me give you my ID.Machete.Why do I want to be a real person... when I'm already a myth?Torrez was just an errand boy. I'm going to find the man who sent the message.Light a candle... Say a prayer...

ELEKTRA.raw_line: Jesus, Sis. How long have you known this one? Twenty minutes?I'm trying to. I've got to get ready for work. And you're in my room.What a charmer. You sure know how to pick `em, Sis.Sure thing. I like a man who takes control.You're under arrest, dick.Yeah, this is Agent Elektra Rivers, Homeland Security. I could use some unis at the corner of Newning and Drake for an assault. Suspect in custody.Yeah. Thanks. I gotta get dressed now.Suit yourself.You too, slut.Hey, turn that up, would you?I'm watching it.What do you know?I'm gone, relax.Elektra Rivers, Department of Homeland Security.DHS has jurisdiction over everyone so give it a rest, Mr--I appreciate that, sir, and I ASSURE YOU--Is the shooter known to you, I mean, did you have any warnings or communication before today?My expertise is in profiling and assessing risks of potentially dangerous individuals who are in this country illegally.Would you like additional DHS officers assigned to your security detail?Here's my card, in case you change your mind. Or you think of anything else.Good. Now I can get some answers.McGraw? McGraw, are you here?Goddamnit! You're fucking my sister?Fuckin' liar.Did you at least get me the files?Well, where the hell are they? RNewman / Endeavor Draft 37.Never mind. I see `em.If you need me, I'll be in the bath. Slut."Problems with authority. Prone to violence. Fatalistic, ruled by a sense of destiny and purpose.""Father was a preacher who butted heads with the local drug baron.""Inherited sense of destiny from father.""Subject was the first to find him.""Subject developed Old Testament- style concepts of vengeance at an early age. Sense of righteousness." RNewman / Endeavor Draft 42."Subject's macabre killing methods traced to childhood tragedy.""Recommendation: Total lockdown."No. But I read the ghost's file. My local contact Mcgraw got it from the hot sheets down south.Ex-boyfriend. Whatever.He's dangerous.I'm working on it.You want me to put this background on the air?You can put the gun away. I'm not going to give you any trouble.Homeland Security. I guess that makes you a terrorist.Come on. Give me some credit. It's not every ex-Federale-turned- assassin that has a local priest on the family payroll. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 54.So are you going to tell me why you did it? Destiny, maybe?A job? Who hired you? The undocumented workers' union?Sonofabitch. Can you prove that?What? Why?"Feelings of righteousness and purpose."Sure thing, Boss.Sonofabitch!What the fuck, man?My gun!You're shot.Let me bring you to a safehouse. I can negotiate your safety. We'll bring Booth down together.You want onions?! Oh shit, you're delirious, dying. Don't die please.What? What do you do with...What, is this some "old Aztec" shit that's supposed to heal you?What do I do with this?Wait, you want this gunk squirted in there...I don't...I....can't.Fuck.Ahhhh!That was disgusting.Do you mind not breaking knives in the house? It's kind of one of my rules. I mean...Oh shit. All right. I'm going to tell him what you told me. Wish me luck.Yeah.I had a little fender bender.Calm down! I have him right now. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 59.Yes, but it's complicated. He's innocent. Sort of.Just listen. Michael Booth orchestrated the assassination attempt on McLaughlin's life.That's right. This was all some kind of hare-brained scheme to call off the ethics investigation. I think I can get Machete to testify.What?I came back to look for you, and I found him like... this. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 67."The more things change--"That's what my Grandma used to say.I'm sorry.Not me. I'm out. But others will.They don't care about Booth. They just want to wipe you out. You're an embarrassment to the feds. I guess I am, too.You could have killed me.I want to help you.First things first, I need a drink.Shit my heel is broke.It's nice having a man around. It's been a while.How long awhile you ask? Well, About two years.Oh that got your attention? Hmm, Actually you're better than my last boyfriend. He never listened. I don't know why I got so desperate. Don't want to grow old alone I guess. You ever get that feeling you're alone and that you'll never meet that one person...Are you listening to me?Give me that bottle.So what happens now, when you get him, that's it? It's over?Did you hear that? Stay here.Oh wow...is that a machete in your pocket or...I'm gonna fuck your brains out old man!Wow that was...Oh my god...did I wake the neighbors?This is one of ours. He works for the agency.My friend and I need a little help.Shit. I don't even want to know who she's fucking now.Fucking shit, bitch. Make him pay for a goddamn hotel.Sis?What's your name?I called in some favors. Look at this. All the right papers; a real identity. You could start over, be a real person.Where will you go?I'll ride with you. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 85.

BENZ.raw_line: You.Not you, Ragged Dick. Him.Get in.You speak English?$125?Naturally.You can call me Benz. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 14.You're sharp. That's right. Just like the car.Have you ever killed anyone before?Drink?Like angels pissing down my throat.Do you know this man?State Senator John McLaughlin, Independent from Cocksucker County. As you know, illegal immigrants such as yourself are being forced out of our country at an alarming rate. If he had his druthers, he'd ship you back to old Meh-Hee-Co. That's his platform: Ship `em back. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 15.But first, he'd make you build a wall along the border for no pay. Not so much as a thank you then get the fuck out.What?That's where you're wrong, friend. What our senator fails to realize is that this country runs on illegal labor. Thrives on it. Keeps costs down, keeps the wheels moving. Bust that, and the world stops turning. You've chaos and shit.For the good of both our peoples, our new senator must die. And for that I will pay you $150,000 cash.You like the machete, huh? Strictly low-tech, but good close-up, or if you're trying to make a particularly brutal point. But it's entirely unsuited to our purposes. Here. Have a look at this.Cheer up, Charlie. This is your golden ticket.Thank you, that'll be all.Who the fuck is this?Get out. Get the fuck out.You're in here with a reporter and a fucking shampoo queen, for Christ sake.People want to know you're one of them. From now on, No manicures, no massages, no English tailored suits.And they'll be picking through your trash looking for a reason to fuck you up. I'm doing everything I can to make your Von problem go away. Don't add more fuel to the fire.I don't give a damn. As long as he lays low and doesn't take a step out of his little tree fort, he and his boys can play soldier till Hell freezes over.I'd say it was a fucking gift from the Gods.Get ready for your numbers to rise like Lazarus. A thousand bucks says it was some bean-eating wetback just took a potshot at you. It will put the fear of God into the ethics commission. Now we get you to the hospital, you make your bedside speech and you're set.Don't think. Know. Check the hospital. Check the morgue. Fucking verify.No further statements. We only hope that the perpetrator is brought to swift justice in an American court.This is a state matter. We've already talked to--Booth. Michael Booth.Looks like you missed one.The senator is trying to project an image of resilience, not fear. Now I'm sure you'll agree, the Senator has had a very trying day.You'll be the first person I call.They weren't, dear. They weren't.Commitment.School, career. Those come first.You're a beautiful girl, April, but that's a tough nut to crack.You have a website? She has a website. You know about this?We'll talk about this later. I'll be in my office.I hope you've got something to celebrate.I picked him up here. Find out if anyone's seen him. He couldn't have done it on his own. He has help. Find the help.Yeah.Holy Mother of Christ. You've got some balls. You missed, asshole.Or else what?...Hello?June? April?Where is my wife and daughter!?!It's beyond my reach, Von. I need you on this now.He's got my wife and daughter.Just find him.Don't you read the papers? McLaughlin's a goddamn saint, a fucking martyr. I've seen to that.You seeing this?We have to find him. We have to find him now! I'm going to rip his heart out with my teeth!Anything?What the hell is that supposed to mean?You want to be a martyr? I'm good at making martyrs.That's right. In our own way, we can all be like Christ. Too bad for you, you chose the worst way.This is the boss.Now for the last time... where are my wife and daughter?Goddamn A T & T. RNewman / Endeavor Draft 74.Taking care of business.Nothing. Just had a little talk with a priest.Whatever you tell them, I'm sure it'll be golden. (off McLaughlin's blankMaybe.You want to be a martyr? I'm good at making martyrs.That's right.Not with that scope.Von! Von!Where are you, goddamnit!? I'm bringing him up.Up your fat, fishbelly ass! RNewman / Endeavor Draft 79.Shut the gate quick! He's after me!He killed McLaughlin. He's coming after me.I saw to it that McLaughlin gave you the keys to this fortress. You owe us.What are you talkin--You can't do this to me, Von! You need me!Glory, glory, hallelujah.
